silverAge.title: What is Silver Age?
silverAge.intro: Silver Age is an accessible, fast-paced Flesh and Blood format designed for quick, intense matches. It features young heroes, lower life totals, and strategic deck selection from a limited card pool, making it perfect for competitive play with a lower barrier to entry.
silverAge.youngHeroesDesc: Play with young hero cards (common, rare, or basic rarity). The lower life totals create faster, more aggressive games that focus on efficient plays and quick decision-making.
silverAge.strategicSelectionDesc: Build a 55-card pool including your hero, weapons, equipment, and deck cards. At the start of each game, you select exactly 40 cards from this pool to use in that match, allowing you to adapt your strategy.
silverAge.accessibleRaritiesDesc: Only common, rare, and basic rarity cards are legal. This keeps deck costs lower and makes the format more accessible while maintaining competitive depth.
silverAge.deckConstructionLine1: 55 total cards: 1 young hero, weapons, equipment, and deck cards.
silverAge.deckConstructionLine2: Card limits: Up to 2 copies of each unique card (not 3).
silverAge.deckConstructionLine3: Game selection: Choose exactly 40 cards from your pool each match.
silverAge.matchFormatDesc: Best-of-1 games with 35-minute rounds. Reveal heroes, determine first player, select your 40-card deck, then draw cards equal to your hero's intellect to begin.
silverAge.officialResourcesDesc: For complete rules, legal card pool, and the latest updates to the Silver Age format:
silverAge.whyHamburgTitle: Why Play Silver Age in Hamburg?
silverAge.whyHamburgDesc: The Silver HH tournament series brings this fast-paced, accessible format to Hamburg with regular events, a welcoming community, and competitive play. The lower cost of entry and quick match times make it perfect for both new players and experienced competitors looking for dynamic gameplay.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.generalInfoText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.
privacy.responsiblePartyTitle: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
privacy.responsiblePartyText: Data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the imprint of this website.
privacy.howWeCollectTitle: How do we collect your data?
privacy.howWeCollectText: Your data is collected on the one hand by you providing it to us. This may include data that you enter in a contact form, for example. Other data is automatically collected or collected with your consent when you visit the website through our IT systems. This is mainly technical data (e.g. internet browser, operating system or time of page access).
privacy.purposeTitle: What do we use your data for?
privacy.purposeText: Part of the data is collected to ensure error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.
privacy.rightsTitle: What rights do you have regarding your data?
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to receive information about the origin, recipient and purpose of your stored personal data free of charge at any time. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future.

about.title: About Silver HH
about.missionText: Silver HH was founded with a simple vision: to create an accessible, affordable tournament series for Flesh and Blood in Hamburg while making a positive impact on our community.
about.affordableText: We believe competitive Flesh and Blood should be accessible to everyone. By choosing the Silver Age format, we keep entry costs low while still providing a dynamic and strategic gameplay experience. Our tournament fees are fair and transparent, allowing more players to participate and grow the community.
about.charityText: What makes Silver HH special is our commitment to the community beyond the game. All proceeds from our tournaments—every entry fee collected—are donated entirely to charitable causes. We carefully select local and international organizations that make a real difference, ensuring that every tournament delivers more than just great gameplay.
about.communityText: The Hamburg Flesh and Blood community is diverse and passionate. Silver HH provides a space where new players are welcome, experienced players can compete, and everyone can benefit from a well-organized, fair, and transparent tournament series.
about.joinUsText: Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, you're invited to be part of Silver HH. Come to one of our upcoming tournaments, meet the community, and play Flesh and Blood—knowing that with every game, you're contributing to something good.
